titleInfo.title: Bill Monroe's Annual Easter Egg Show (19627)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Bill Monroe's Annual Easter Egg Show Brown County Jamboree in Bean Blossom on March 25 and 26. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill and James Monroe. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40950/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
